description.description: A string containing the description of the group.

displayName.description: A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.

externalIds.description: A list of external IDs that contains the identifiers issued to this resource by an external identity provider. See External IDs below.

groupId.description: The identifier of the newly created group in the identity store.

identityStoreId.description:
The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

The following arguments are optional:

displayName.description: A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.

identityStoreId.description:
The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

The following arguments are optional:
